personal_information.name: Ayush Kaithwas
personal_information.role: Automation Engineer | Embedded Systems & Robotics Developer

professional_experience.title: Automation Engineer
highlights: Developed complete control software for high-precision Peristaltic Pump and Automatic Pipetting Station using STM32, FreeRTOS, HAL drivers, and TouchGFX.
Improved fluid dispensing accuracy from ±10% to ±0.5%, achieving industry-grade repeatability.
Designed responsive TouchGFX UI with custom widgets for enhanced operator usability.
Implemented safety checks, fault handling, and stable inter-task communication to improve system reliability.
Worked extensively on embedded firmware, motion control, and hardware–software co-design.

professional_experience.title: Robotics Programmer & Mentor
highlights: Led programming for multiple FTC robots using Java, contributing to wins at FTC Regionals 2024 and Asia Pacific Open Championship 2024 (Australia).
Mentored NGO teams under resource constraints, teaching control systems, inverse kinematics, and automation logic.
Conducted Java programming workshops with strong participant feedback.
Worked on advanced robotic prototypes including quadruped robots, robotic arms, Mars rover prototypes, and assistive robots.

professional_experience.title: Embedded Developer
highlights: Implemented ESP-NOW, BLE, Firebase, and WiFi Mesh for connected IoT systems.
Built end-to-end IoT solutions integrating embedded firmware with web dashboards.
Worked on real-time sensor data acquisition and embedded control logic.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (Electronics and Communication Engineering)
education.institution: Madan Mohan Malaviya University of Technology

projects.name: MachineCodeALHS (Automatic Liquid Handling System)
highlights: Developed a precision automation platform with a 3-axis (X, Y, Z) motion system.
Integrated camera-based detection to verify labware presence and alignment.
Enabled high-precision liquid dispensing for automated laboratory workflows.

projects.name: Global Home Automation
highlights: Enabled remote control of appliances globally via internet-connected microcontrollers.
Integrated cloud communication for real-time responsiveness.
Implemented an electricity monitoring system to track unit usage.

projects.name: FTC-Paraducks 2025
highlights: Engineered an integrated intake-outtake system for handling samples and specimens.
Utilized a rack-and-pinion mechanism for smooth linear motion.
Implemented advanced software logic for synchronizing subsystems and autonomous routines.

projects.name: Apoc-Paracducks (APOC Robot)
highlights: Designed for the Asia Pacific Open Championship with 8 motors and 12 servos.
Featured an active roller intake and bucket-based transfer system.
Optimized for high-performance Autonomous and TeleOp scoring on the BackDrop.

projects.name: Friday (Voice Assistant)
highlights: Developed a Python-based voice assistant with an interactive UI.
Implemented task automation for media, math, and system operations.
Integrated smart home control and network management features.

projects.name: Countries-Info
highlights: Created a website to showcase global country data.
Implemented filtering functionality based on country name and continent.
Designed an intuitive interface for browsing geographical information.

projects.name: Automation Circuit
highlights: Built a Bluetooth-based home automation system using ATmega8A and HC-05.
Designed a custom PCB with relay switching and signal conditioning.
Enabled real-time wireless control of appliances via smartphone app.

projects.name: Omnific Cars Website
highlights: Built a full-stack car listing platform using React and Express.js.
Implemented CRUD functionality for users to submit and manage listings.
Created a dynamic browsing experience categorized by car brand.

projects.name: Flask Website
highlights: Developed a secure full-stack web application using Flask (Python).
Implemented user authentication (login/logout) and role-based dashboards.
Designed a responsive frontend with an interactive contact section.

projects.name: Omnific Coder Website
highlights: Designed a personal portfolio to showcase projects and skills.
Built a clean, responsive UI for seamless navigation on all devices.
Structured content effectively for professional presentation.

projects.name: URL Shortener
highlights: Created a backend-driven application to convert long URLs into shareable links.
Implemented redirection handling for efficient navigation.
Included basic link management features.

projects.name: F-R-I-D-A-Y (Terminal Version)
highlights: Built a terminal-based voice assistant focused on system automation.
Supported commands for app launching, web navigation, and OS operations.
Integrated core speech recognition and command parsing logic.

projects.name: Face Detection
highlights: Developed a real-time face detection system using OpenCV.
Implemented simultaneous detection of eyes and smiles.
Utilized feature-based cascades for live camera input analysis.

projects.name: Music Player
highlights: Developed a GUI-based audio player using Python Tkinter.
Implemented core controls: play, pause, add, delete, and clear-all.
Ensured efficient audio file management and playback.

projects.name: Hand Recognition
highlights: Built a computer vision system to identify hand types and finger counts.
Integrated real-time feedback with an LCD display.
Utilized advanced detection algorithms for accurate tracking.

projects.name: Space Invaders
highlights: Recreated the classic arcade game with custom logic.
Implemented enemy wave patterns and collision detection.
Designed graphics rendering for smooth gameplay.

projects.name: Shooter-Game
highlights: Developed a 2D arcade-style game using Python Pygame.
Featured real-time shooting mechanics and enemy combat.
Implemented live high-score tracking and health monitoring.

projects.name: Snake-Game
highlights: Recreated the classic Snake game with grid-based movement.
Implemented collision logic and increasing difficulty levels.
Designed a responsive game loop for smooth control.

projects.name: Stone-Paper-Scissors Game
highlights: Built an interactive player-versus-computer game.
Implemented randomization logic for unpredictable computer moves.
Designed a simple interface for user interaction.
